resources.string: Selected output image format is not available in free app version.
The full app version has no ads and allows you as well to:
Convert images to and from TIF format
You can unlock the full version for only &price; a year.
Not sure yet? Try out our 3-day free trial.
Free app version supports only BMP, GIF, JPG, PNG and WEBP as input image formats.
Please try again later or contact support.
